definition: Salvation Army (protestant philanthropic organization founded in London in 1865)

sentences.english: Donate extra clothes and furniture to friends, or even better, the Salvation Army.
sentences.chinese: 多餘的衣服和傢俱，捐給朋友，或者捐給救世軍更好。

sentences.english: When my daughter moves, she will give her flotsam and jetsam to the Salvation Army.
sentences.chinese: 我女兒搬家時，她將把不要的東西送給救世軍。

sentences.english: Your donation will fund all social services under The Salvation Army.
sentences.chinese: 您的捐獻將支助救世軍旗下所有的社會服務。

sentences.english: Two of the largest organizations include Goodwill and The Salvation Army.
sentences.chinese: 最大的機構之二包括谷德維爾和救世軍。

sentences.english: Our Salvation Army could whoop N. Korea.
sentences.chinese: 我們救世軍能夠抹平朝鮮。

sentences.english: Give away the rest to the Salvation Army.
sentences.chinese: 剩下的就託付給救世軍吧。

sentences.english: In addition, Salvation Army staff is typically part of the rehabilitation program as well.
sentences.chinese: 另外，救世軍成員也是康復治療項目中的特有部分。

sentences.english: In what year did the Salvation Army commence operations in Singapore?
sentences.chinese: 救世軍從哪一年開始在新加坡展開活動？

pinyin: Lian2 he2 guo2 Er2 tong2 Ji1 jin1 hui4

definition: Minister of Education/Director of Education Department

pinyin: Ying1 guo2 Wen2 hua4 Xie2 hui4

definition: Queens, one of the five boroughs of New York City
golden years (after the age of about 60)
